Headline: #36 Broadway and #62 Archer Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/Randolph
ShortDescription: Southbound 36 Broadway and 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Staste, Wacker, Clark and Washington: due to, street blockage near  State/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #36 Broadway and #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Staste, Wacker, Clark and Washington: due to, street blockage near  State/Randolph.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted WB: 63rd, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive and 63rd; EB: 63rd, King Drive, 61st, Cottage Grove and 63rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Cottage Grove due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive and 63rd.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, King Drive, 61st, Cottage Grove and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
